Subscription.Description: Certificate services received request, approved, issued, denied.
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <Query Id="1" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[Provider[@Name='AD FS Auditing']]]</Select> </Query> <Query Id="2" Path="Security"> <Select
